Texts.Chs: 各种各样的任务包含在这里，从基本的生存到更复杂的内容。
Texts.Eng: A wide variety of quests fill this group, from basic survival to more complex things such as teaching poodles to fly, or the French Revolution.
Going places will lead to the completion of tasks in this grouping. If travel is your aim, you'll have no problems here.

Texts.Chs: 在这里你可以跟踪那些不能整合到其他任务组中的杂项任务。
Texts.Eng: Here you can track miscellaneous tasks which may not fit into other quest groupings.

Texts.Chs: 你将通过这一系列的任务来学习富兰克林的宇宙的基础知识。你会被指导制作各种工作台的最早版本，并了解到如何获取基础资源。
Texts.Eng: Learn the basics of Frackin Universe through this series of quests. You'll be guided through each of the initial stations, their use, and informed of basic resource acquisition.
Quests in this grouping tend to be related to battle, be it killing monsters or creating new sorts of weaponry.
The basics of manual ship building.
These tasks are of the utmost importance. Without completing them nobody will think you are as awesome as I am. That is clearly not something you would desire.

To build a lab, you have a great number of things to do. This set of quests will serve to aid you in doing exactly that. Learn the function of each station, how it is used in conjunction with other stations in your arsenal and more!

Texts.Chs:
点击右面的任务线，然后相关的信息将会显示在这里。

任务的颜色表示了任务的状态： 
^red;红色^reset; ： 不能接受
^yellow;黄色^reset; ： 可接受
^cyan;天蓝^reset; ： 进行中
^green;绿色^reset; ： 已完成 

可能会有不同的任务线，你可以通过点击左侧窗口顶部的大图来查看它们。
Texts.Eng:
To select a task, click on its name on the left window, and relevant information will be displayed here.

Tasks also come with a color to represent your progress with them: 
^red;red^reset; : unavailable
^yellow;yellow^reset; : available
^cyan;cyan^reset; : in progress
^green;green^reset; : complete.

There may be different task branches, which you can access by pressing the big image at the top of the window on the left. More become available as you unlock them.
